title: Blockcerts Credential Subject schema
description: Defining the properties as they would be natively understood by Blockcerts Verifier. This is purely informational and implementers should feel free to implement `credentialSubject` as fits their needs.

Claim.description: This is the explicit claim bound to the credentialSubject

type.description: Allows to define the type of credentialSubject.

publicKey.description: Public key of the recipient. Could be a blockchain address, or a public key used to certify the recipient is the recipient.

content.description: The content to display. Must be encoded following the contentEncoding property.

claim.description: Define the claim(s) associated with the credentialSubject
